More Patients cured by Anisha Bharti SpecializationsYoga & Naturopathy Homoeopath of - Dev Sanskriti Vishwavidyalaya University UttarakhandDegree of and SurgeryPassing Year 2004 Panjab University - ChandigarhDegree Diploma in Naturopathy & Yoga (NDDY)Passing Year 2018 About Dr. Anisha Bharti Dr. Anisha Bharti is a Homoeopathy, Yoga & Naturopathy and Ayurveda Doctor in Patna, Bihar. She went to and Diploma in Naturopathy & Yoga (NDDY). She is a member of Bihar Board of Homoeopathic System of Medicine. She has an overall experience of 8 years, Practicing at Homeo Health Care. She is a witty and personable doctor who takes great pride in her work, and always puts the needs of her patients first.
